text: The 1977 European Cup Winners' Cup Final was a football match. It was contested between Hamburger SV of West Germany and the defending champions, Anderlecht of Belgium. It was the final match of the 1976–77 European Cup Winners' Cup tournament and the 17th European Cup Winners' Cup final. ==Venue== The final was held at Olympisch Stadion in Amsterdam, Netherlands. The venue was decided in Bern by the UEFA Executive Committee on 17 September 1976.http://hemeroteca.mundodeportivo.com/preview/1976/09/18/pagina-6/1021971/pdf.html Hamburg won the match 2–0 thanks to goals by Georg Volkert and Felix Magath. ==Route to the final== Hamburger SV Hamburger SV Hamburger SV Hamburger SV Anderlecht Anderlecht Anderlecht Anderlecht Opponent Agg. 1st leg 2nd leg Opponent Agg. 1st leg 2nd leg Keflavík 4–1 3–0 (H) 1–1 (A) First round Roda 5–3 2–1 (H) 3–2 (A) Hearts 8–3 4–2 (H) 4–1 (A) Second round Galatasaray 10–2 5–1 (H) 5–1 (A) MTK Budapest 5–2 1–1 (A) 4–1 (H) Quarter-finals Southampton 3–2 2–0 (H) 1–2 (A) Atlético Madrid 4–3 1–3 (A) 3–0 (H) Semi-finals Napoli 2–1 0–1 (A) 2–0 (H) ==Match details== {| style="font-size:90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 1 Rudi Kargus DF Manfred Kaltz DF Hans-Jürgen Ripp DF Peter Nogly (c) DF Peter Hidien MF Caspar Memering MF Felix Magath MF Ferdinand Keller FW Arno Steffenhagen FW Willi Reimann FW Georg Volkert Manager: Manager: Manager: Kuno Klötzer Kuno Klötzer Kuno Klötzer Kuno Klötzer ==References== ==Other websites== * UEFA Cup Winners' Cup results at Rec.Sport.Soccer Statistics Foundation * European Cup Winners' Cup Final Category:UEFA Cup Winners' Cup Finals European Cup Winners' Cup Final Category:History of Amsterdam
